name: Cookie Salad I
author: JT
summary: This is my mom's recipe, and it is delicious!  It can be served as either a salad or dessert.  This recipe can also be used to make parfaits.  Simply layer the salad, extra whipped topping, crushed cookies and repeat.  Top parfaits with a dollop of whipped topping.  Or, to serve as a pie, pour into a graham cracker or cookie crust and chill before serving.
ingredients: 2 (3.4 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix
½ (11.5 ounce) package fudge stripe cookies
directions: In a large bowl, mix together the pudding mix and the buttermilk
Mix in the pineapple chunks and mandarin oranges
Crush cookies and mix in just before serving
